import React,{Suspense,useEffect}from'react';import{HashRouter,Route,Routes}from'react-router-dom';import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import{CSpinner,useColorModes}from'@coreui/react';import'./scss/style.scss';// Containers
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DefaultLayout=/*#__PURE__*/React.lazy(()=>import('./layout/DefaultLayout'));// Pages
